mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( USER_NO, USER_NAME, USER_NICKNAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_PWD, GENDER, AGE ) VALUES ( SEQ_UNO.NEXTVAL, #{userName}, #{userNickname}, #{userEmail}, #{userPwd}, #{gender}, #{age} )
INSERT INTO MEM_PHYSICAL_INFO ( PINFO_NO, USER_NO )VALUES ( SEQ_UPINO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_UNO.CURRVAL )
mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO, USER_NAME, USER_NICKNAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_PWD, GENDER, AGE, USER_POINT, ENROLL_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail} AND USER_PWD = #{userPwd} AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT USER_NO, USER_NAME, USER_NICKNAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_PWD, GENDER, AGE, USER_POINT, ENROLL_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_NICKNAME = #{nickname} AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT PINFO_NO, USER_NO, MEM_HEIGHT, MEM_WEIGHT, MEM_SMM, MEM_BFP FROM MEMBER JOIN MEM_PHYSICAL_INFO USING (USER_NO) WHERE USER_NICKNAME = #{nickname} AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT PIC_NO, USER_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH FROM MEMBER JOIN USER_PIC USING (USER_NO) WHERE USER_NICKNAME = #{nickname} AND STATUS = 'Y'
